thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
The Xi Dynasty
China edged closer to a return to one-man rule ahead of its annual parliamentary session, as the Communist Party prepared constitutional changes that would allow Xi Jinping to serve as president indefinitely. A proposal to eliminate presidential term limits would abolish an institutional check introduced after Mao Zedongâ€™s death in 1976 and risks a return to the power struggles that hobbled China during past leadership successions. President Xi has accumulated unrivaled authority in recent months,...
